name: Labyrinth Quest 2073
description:
Labyrinth quest 2073 - a maze game from the developers from Biton.Inc! In it, you have to get out of a huge maze, in order to make it easier for you in the game there are clues that you have to find, look around carefully! There are no saves here, just a pause. 

Good luck!

Developed by Biton in 2021.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 9100f Processor or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 2GB /  AMD Radeon RX 550 2GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
    • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
CREDITS 3D Models + other assets used Modular Sci Fi Office by Ruslan Nazirov from Epic Games Development log

1.0

1.1 Bugs fixed

1.2 Added new hint
